history.name: Bagyong Glenda
details: uprooted big trees and electric posts

recommendations.description: Pael Subdivision is an area consisting of houses and few buildings. This makes the area susceptible to fire as the houses are close together. Additionally, the area is also at high risk when it comes to flooding and earthquakes.
flooding: Listen to local news in the area.
Be ready to evacuate if there are signs of flooding.
Secure your home and turn off the power in the house.
fire: Do not leave flammable things unattended.
Make sure to prepare fire extinguishers and contacts of emergency units.
Ensure there are emergency exits in your house.
ground shaking: Practice duck, cover, and hold.
Stay in the building and find a sturdy hiding place (i.e. tables, bed).
If outside, move to an open area away from buildings, windows, and trees.

history.name: Bagyong Glenda
details: uprooted big trees and electric posts

recommendations.description: Pook Arboretum is an area consisting of trees and vegetations. Furthermore, the area has inclined elevation which makes the soil unstable during earthquakes. Moreover, the area is highly susceptible to flooding.
flooding: Avoid moving streams of water.
Tread the water carefully to avoid sudden drops.
If trapped, wait for rescuers.
fire: Contact local authorities when there are signs of fire in the area.
ground shaking: Move to an open area away from trees or electrical poles.
When in a vehicle, move to an open area on the side of the road and stop.
Avoid going to area with unstable inclined soil.

history.name: Bagyong Glenda
details: uprooted big trees and electric posts

recommendations.description: UP Ayala Land Technohub is a low-density complex. Mostly consists of small buildings and businesses for technology hub. The buildings are highly susceptible to ground shaking.
flooding: Be ready to evacuate if there are signs of flooding.
Tread the water carefully.
fire: Contact local emergency units when there are signs of fire in the area.
Be ready to evacuate.
ground shaking: When in a building, move away from windows and outside walls.
Do not use elevators and stay put.
If outside, move to open areas away from buildings and trees.

history.name: Bagyong Glenda
details: uprooted big trees and electric posts

recommendations.description: The UP Academic Oval and Sunken Garden are open areas. They are generally the evacuation sites for adjacent areas.
flooding: Be ready to seek higher ground along the upper banks of the Sunken Garden or along the sidewalks.
Avoid moving streams of water.
Thread the water carefully to avoid sudden drops.
If stuck, wait for rescuers.
fire: Contact local emergency units when there are signs of fire in the area.
Avoid falling debris from trees or wooden posts.
ground shaking: Practice duck, cover, and hold.
Look out for falling trees, posts and moving vehicles if any.
If near buildings, move to an open area immediately after shaking.

details: flooding in Pook C.P. Garcia & Pook Daan Tubo

fire: Pook Daan Tubo & Pook Libis

recommendations.description: Pook C.P. Garcia, Pook Daan Tubo, and Pook Libis are all high-density residential areas. These areas are highly susceptible to fire. They are also susceptible to flooding due to having a lower elevation.
flooding: Be ready to evacuate if there are signs of flooding.
Secure your home and turn off the power in the house.
fire: Avoid placing flammable objects to potential heat/fire sources.
Prepare fire extinguishers and contacts of fire.emergency units.
Immediately evacuate outside, covering the mouth and nose, where there are signs of fire.
ground shaking: Practice duck, cover, and hold.
Stay put and find a sturdy hiding place (i.e. tables, bed).
If indoors, move away from windows and outside walls.
If outside, move to an open area away from buildings, windows, and trees.
